Text: Just a heads up... I don't know what's wrong with this one but the scanner Fawkes-Empire has released a "fixed" version.
don't worry, there's nothing wrong about this. u can check and then comments. that'll help others.

I downloaded this torrent and checked to see what the problem is. There is an error on page 13 (nm02-012.jpg). A third of the page is missing (it's greyed out). 

Fawkes-Empire has released "Nowhere Men 002 (2012) (fixed) (Digital) (Fawkes-Empire)" to fix this problem.
sorry to missed that. actually i've a job that is 6 days  14 hours. im doing these upload thing when i'm free. so can't check every files. sorry downloaders.

It isn't your fault so there's no need to apologize reneshakil... You can't check every book AND upload them in a timely fashion. Besides, Empire scanners are usually perfect 999 times out of 1000. I was just trying to warn people of the problem with this one comic... 

Thanks for your uploads and keep up the awesome work!

reneshakil, thank you very much for using your limited free time to share comics! for everyone i have tracked down and posted the FIXED .cbr file from Fawkes-Empire.

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7946174/Nowhere_Men_002_%282012%29_%28FIXED%29_%28digital%29_%28Fawkes-Empire%29
All your hard work is appreciated. I personally am grateful to all uploaders.
thank u all for understand my situation. i'll be more careful next time.
